from OpenZeppelin ERC721, AccessControl, Pausable, and ReentrancyGuard contracts. Uses a bonding curve pricing mechanism and supports special color mode for qualifying artworks.","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"ERC721IncorrectOwner(address,uint256,address)":[{"details":"Indicates an error related to the ownership over a particular token. Used in transfers.","params":{"owner":"Address of the current owner of a token.","sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred.","tokenId":"Identifier number of a token."}}],"ERC721InsufficientApproval(address,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `operator`\u2019s approval. Used in transfers.","params":{"operator":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.","tokenId":"Identifier number of a token."}}],"ERC721InvalidApprover(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"approver":"Address initiating an approval operation."}}],"ERC721InvalidOperator(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the `operator` to be approved. Used in approvals.","params":{"operator":"Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner."}}],"ERC721InvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"Indicates that an address can't be an owner. For example, `address(0)` is a forbidden owner in ERC-20. Used in balance queries.","params":{"owner":"Address of the current owner of a token."}}],"ERC721InvalidReceiver(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.","params":{"receiver":"Address to which tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC721InvalidSender(address)":[{"details":"Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.","params":{"sender":"Address whose tokens are being transferred."}}],"ERC721NonexistentToken(uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates a `tokenId` whose `owner` is the zero address.","params":{"tokenId":"Identifier number of a token."}}],"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"events":{"Approval(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token."},"ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool)":{"details":"Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets."},"AvailableBlockUpdateRequested(address)":{"params":{"user":"Address of the user requesting the update."}},"AvailablePixelsUpdated(address,uint256)":{"params":{"newAllowance":"New pixel allowance.","user":"Address of the user."}},"CommitmentSubmitted(address,bytes32)":{"params":{"commitmentHash":"The hash of the commitment.","user":"Address of the user."}},"FundsExtracted(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount of ETH transferred.","to":"Address of the recipient."}},"MintingHasStopped(bool)":{"params":{"paused":"Boolean state indicating if minting is paused."}},"NFTMinted(address,uint256,bytes32)":{"params":{"artHash":"The hash representing the art.","tokenId":"The minted token's ID.","user":"Address of the user."}},"Paused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Transfer(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`."},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-approve}."},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"See {IERC721-balanceOf}."},"constructor":{"params":{"contractAdmin":"Address that will receive the ADMIN_ROLE","contractOwner":"Address that will receive the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE","externalWallet":"Address where funds will be sent when withdrawn","name_":"The name of the NFT collection.","symbol_":"The symbol of the NFT collection."}},"countBlackPixels(bytes32[4])":{"details":"Uses Brian Kernighan's algorithm for efficient counting. Each bit represents a pixel, where 1 = black and 0 = white. The function counts the number of set bits (1s) across all bytes32 values.","params":{"artData":"The 32x32 grid represented as an array of bytes32"},"returns":{"pixelCount":"The number of black pixels"}},"currentPrice()":{"details":"Price increases as the actual supply exceeds the ideal supply rate. Returns maximum value if max supply has been reached to prevent minting.","returns":{"price":"The current price to mint an NFT in wei."}},"generateArtHash(bytes32[4])":{"details":"Uses keccak256 to create a deterministic hash of the entire art piece","params":{"artData":"The 32x32 grid represented as an array of bytes32"},"returns":{"_0":"bytes32 A unique hash representing the entire art piece"}},"getApproved(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-getApproved}."},"getArtData(uint256)":{"details":"Reverts if the token does not exist","params":{"tokenId":"The ID of the token"},"returns":{"artData":"The art data as an array of bytes32","useColorMode":"Boolean indicating if the NFT uses a special color palette"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC721-isApprovedForAll}."},"isArtUnique(bytes32)":{"details":"Uses the mintedArts mapping to check if the art has already been minted.","params":{"artHash":"The hash representing the art."},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the art has not been minted yet."}},"mintNFT(bytes32[4],bool)":{"details":"Verifies that the revealed data matches the commitment and all other requirements are met. ETH payment is required at this stage based on the current price.","params":{"artData":"The actual art data representing the 32x32 grid as an array of 4 bytes32 values.","useColorMode":"Boolean indicating if the NFT should use a special color palette."}},"name()":{"details":"See {IERC721Metadata-name}."},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-ownerOf}."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"requestAvailableBlockUpdate()":{"details":"Emits an event that can be picked up by an off-chain service. No state changes occur on-chain from this function."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-safeTransferFrom}."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC721-safeTransferFrom}."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"See {IERC721-setApprovalForAll}."},"setTestMode(bool)":{"details":"Only callable by admin. Used for testing purposes only.","params":{"isTest":"Boolean flag to enable or disable test mode"}},"startMinting(bytes32)":{"details":"The commitment prevents front-running by hiding the actual art data until reveal. No ETH is required at this stage. Implements commit-reveal pattern. Users can replace their commitment if the previous one has expired (COMMITMENT_DELAY + 1 second).","params":{"commitmentHash":"Hash of the art data combined with the sender's address."}},"stopMinting()":{"details":"Callable only by accounts with DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE. Calls the _pause() function and emits MintingHasStopped event. Once stopped, cannot be reversed by design."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Resolves the inheritance conflict between ERC721 and AccessControl.","params":{"interfaceId":"The interface identifier to check support for."},"returns":{"_0":"bool True if the interface is supported."}},"symbol()":{"details":"See {IERC721Metadata-symbol}."},"tokenURI(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721Metadata-tokenURI}."},"totalSupply()":{"details":"Simply returns the current token counter value.","returns":{"_0":"uint256 The current token count."}},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-transferFrom}."},"updateAvailableBlocks(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Callable only by accounts with ADMIN_ROLE. Maps linearly to range [1, 1024].","params":{"firstTxTime":"The timestamp of user's first transaction (tracked off-chain by admin).","nonce":"The nonce value for calculation.","user":"The address of the user."}},"withdraw()":{"details":"Only callable by ADMIN_ROLE or DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE. Transfers entire contract balance to the EXTERNAL_WALLET address. Follows checks-effects-interactions pattern for security."}},"title":"ArtProject01 NFT Contract","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"ActiveCommitmentExists()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when an active d.sol":{"keccak256":"0x11a5a79827df29e915a12740caf62fe21ebe27c08c9ae3e09abe9ee3ba3866d3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3cf0c69ab827e3251db9ee6a50647d62c90ba580a4d7bbff21f2bea39e7b2f4a","dweb:/ipfs/QmZiKwtKU1SBX4RGfQtY7PZfiapbbu6SZ9vizGQD9UHjRA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Strings.sol":{"keccak256":"0x44f87e91783e88415bde66f1a63f6c7f0076f2d511548820407d5c95643ac56c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://13a51bc2b23827744dcf5bad10c69e72528cf015a6fe48c93632cdb2c0eb1251","dweb:/ipfs/QmZwPA47Yqgje1qtkdEFEja8ntTahMStYzKf5q3JRnaR7d"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0xddce8e17e3d3f9ed818b4f4c4478a8262aab8b11ed322f1bf5ed705bb4bd97fa","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8084aa71a4cc7d2980972412a88fe4f114869faea3fefa5436431644eb5c0287","dweb:/ipfs/Qmbqfs5dRdPvHVKY8kTaeyc65NdqXRQwRK7h9s5UJEhD1p"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x79796192ec90263f21b464d5bc90b777a525971d3de8232be80d9c4f9fb353b8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f6fda447a62815e8064f47eff0dd1cf58d9207ad69b5d32280f8d7ed1d1e4621","dweb:/ipfs/QmfDRc7pxfaXB2Dh9np5Uf29Na3pQ7tafRS684wd3GLjVL"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa00be322d7db5786750ce0ac7e2f5b633ac30a5ed5fa1ced1e74acfc19acecea","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6c84e822f87cbdc4082533b626667b6928715bb2b1e8e7eb96954cebb9e38c8d","dweb:/ipfs/QmZmy9dgxLTerBAQDuuHqbL6EpgRxddqgv5KmwpXYVbKz1"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/SafeCast.sol":{"keccak256":"0x195533c86d0ef72bcc06456a4f66a9b941f38eb403739b00f21fd7c1abd1ae54","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b1d578337048cad08c1c03041cca5978eff5428aa130c781b271ad9e5566e1f8","dweb:/ipfs/QmPFKL2r9CBsMwmUqqdcFPfHZB2qcs9g1HDrPxzWSxomvy"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/SignedMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb1970fac7b64e6c09611e6691791e848d5e3fe410fa5899e7df2e0afd77a99e3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://db5fbb3dddd8b7047465b62575d96231ba8a2774d37fb4737fbf23340fabbb03","dweb:/ipfs/QmVUSvooZKEdEdap619tcJjTLcAuH6QBdZqAzWwnAXZAWJ"]},"packages/hardhat/contracts/blocks.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9e2d92d7e06a6bc50901346a1acc1559ff638184b7c62d2d7105f15bad3880be","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2b9f6560363154c26339e79b5f59d9f043303acb0735154cfb5c4b941bd538ca","dweb:/ipfs/QmchruzUv33CKgsfDnSTzHMbzFq4JJFHm6jajhyL995zBr"]}},"version":1}

params.contractAdmin: Address that will receive the ADMIN_ROLE
params.contractOwner: Address that will receive the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE
params.externalWallet: Address where funds will be sent when withdrawn
params.name_: The name of the NFT collection.
params.symbol_: The symbol of the NFT collection.

countBlackPixels(bytes32[4]).details: Uses Brian Kernighan's algorithm for efficient counting. Each bit represents a pixel, where 1 = black and 0 = white. The function counts the number of set bits (1s) across all bytes32 values.

params.artData: The 32x32 grid represented as an array of bytes32

currentPrice().details: Price increases as the actual supply exceeds the ideal supply rate. Returns maximum value if max supply has been reached to prevent minting.

returns.price: The current price to mint an NFT in wei.

generateArtHash(bytes32[4]).details: Uses keccak256 to create a deterministic hash of the entire art piece

params.artData: The 32x32 grid represented as an array of bytes32

returns._0: bytes32 A unique hash representing the entire art piece

getArtData(uint256).details: Reverts if the token does not exist

returns.artData: The art data as an array of bytes32
returns.useColorMode: Boolean indicating if the NFT uses a special color palette

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

isArtUnique(bytes32).details: Uses the mintedArts mapping to check if the art has already been minted.

returns._0: bool True if the art has not been minted yet.

mintNFT(bytes32[4],bool).details: Verifies that the revealed data matches the commitment and all other requirements are met. ETH payment is required at this stage based on the current price.

params.artData: The actual art data representing the 32x32 grid as an array of 4 bytes32 values.
params.useColorMode: Boolean indicating if the NFT should use a special color palette.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

requestAvailableBlockUpdate().details: Emits an event that can be picked up by an off-chain service. No state changes occur on-chain from this function.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setTestMode(bool).details: Only callable by admin. Used for testing purposes only.

params.isTest: Boolean flag to enable or disable test mode

startMinting(bytes32).details: The commitment prevents front-running by hiding the actual art data until reveal. No ETH is required at this stage. Implements commit-reveal pattern. Users can replace their commitment if the previous one has expired (COMMITMENT_DELAY + 1 second).

params.commitmentHash: Hash of the art data combined with the sender's address.

stopMinting().details: Callable only by accounts with DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE. Calls the _pause() function and emits MintingHasStopped event. Once stopped, cannot be reversed by design.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Resolves the inheritance conflict between ERC721 and AccessControl.

params.interfaceId: The interface identifier to check support for.

returns._0: bool True if the interface is supported.

totalSupply().details: Simply returns the current token counter value.

updateAvailableBlocks(address,uint256,ui.details: Callable only by accounts with ADMIN_ROLE. Maps linearly to range [1, 1024].

params.firstTxTime: The timestamp of user's first transaction (tracked off-chain by admin).

withdraw().details: Only callable by ADMIN_ROLE or DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE. Transfers entire contract balance to the EXTERNAL_WALLET address. Follows checks-effects-interactions pattern for security.

COLOR_MODE_THRESHOLD().notice: Threshold of black pixels required to use color mode

COMMITMENT_DELAY().notice: Minimum time (in seconds) that must pass between commitment and reveal

EXTERNAL_WALLET().notice: Address of the external wallet for fund withdrawals

MAX_PRODUCT().notice: Maximum expected product for pixel calculation

MAX_SUPPLY().notice: Maximum number of NFTs that can be minted

NONCE_MULTIPLIER().notice: Constant multiplier for nonce in pixel calculation

PRICE_INCREMENT().notice: Price increment for tokens minted above the ideal schedule.

TOKENS_PER_DAY().notice: Constant for tokens per day as per minting schedule.

artNFTs(uint256).notice: Mapping from tokenId to ArtNFT struct.

availablePixels(address).notice: Mapping from user address to available pixels.

commitmentTimestamps(address).notice: Mapping from user address to commitment timestamp.

commitments(address).notice: Mapping from user address to commitment hash.

deploymentTime().notice: Timestamp when the contract was deployed.

mintedArts(bytes32).notice: Mapping to ensure art uniqueness. True if the art has been minted.

mintingStopped().notice: Kill switch variable to stop minting permanently.

testMode().notice: Flag to allow bypassing EOA check in tests
